__TOC__

If you wish to create tests using the sources_test script, you will need to write jobs with the following format:

<pre>
plugin: shell
name: miscellanea/sources_list
command: sources_test /etc/apt/sources.list 'deb http://gb.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ precise-updates main restricted, deb http://gb.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ precise main restricted'
</pre>
